```{r}
?left_join()

source("conn.R")

internship <- tbl(conStudent, 'internship') 
organization <- tbl(conStudent, 'organization') 
currPosition <- tbl(conStudent, 'currentPosition') 
fulltime <- tbl(conStudent, 'fulltime')

internship %>% 
  left_join(organization) %>% 
  group_by(organizationId) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(organizationId)) %>%    #to drop the NA, use filter with a negate operator
  
  
iternship %>% group_by(organizationId) %>% 

OrgtoInt <- right_join(organization, internship, by = "organizationId") 

CurrtoInt <- left_join(currPosition, internship, by = "graduationId")
  
fTime<- left_join(fulltime, CurrtoInt, by = "idCurrentPosition")
```
